mapper.select: select ID id, BLOG_TITLE blogTitle, BLOG_TYPE blogType, BLOG_CONTENT blogContent, BLOG_AUTHOR blogAuthor, BLOG_STATE blogState, CREATE_TIME createTime, UPDATE_TIME updateTime from tb_blog tb where tb.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_blog( BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_TYPE, BLOG_CONTENT, BLOG_AUTHOR, BLOG_STATE, CREATE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG )values ( #{blogTitle}, #{blogType}, #{blogContent}, #{blogAuthor}, #{blogState}, now(), '1' )
